short_summary: Request for international trucking service on behalf of Canadian Coast Guard College (CCGC)  for storage and moving.
description: request for International trucking service on behalf of Canadian Coast guard college (CCGC) on year 2024
full_summary:
### External Bid Solicitation

#### Title

EB144-241720 - College of the Canadian Coast Guard Moving and Storage Contract

#### Reference Information

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS4408705823 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4408705823 |
| Amendment Number | 2 |
| Publication Date | 2024-02-02 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-02-21T14:00:00 |

#### Contract Details

* **Contractor Type**: Service provider
* **Contract Details**: Canada is seeking offers from service providers to provide moving and storage services to the Canadian Coast Guard College (CCGC) on behalf of Public Service and Procurement Canada (PSPC).
* **Contract Location**: Nova Scotia, Canada
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Tender Process

* **Request for Proposal**: Yes
* **Tender Process**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Tender Evaluation**: Based on the lowest price

#### Important Dates

* **Publication Date**: 2024-02-02
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-02-21T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Genevieve Petten (she/her)
* **Contact Email**: [genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contracting Agency**: Public Service and Procurement Canada (PSPC)

Note: All the fields are extracted from the raw data provided. 400-word limit avoided or all the extra information.   Let me know if you want any changes.   
 
Oh, sorry for the potential overflow, but, can be edited, if any changes the contractor would want!
